import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Order(){ const [singleRoom, setSingleRoom] = useState({}) const [total, setTotal] = useState(0) const [night, setNight] = useState(1) const {id} = useParams() console.log(singleRoom); console.log(total); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:9292/bnbs/${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setSingleRoom(data)) }, []) return( <>

{singleRoom.name}

KES. {singleRoom.price} / 1 night

Entire home for {singleRoom.bed} guest

Receipt Summary

{singleRoom.price} x console.log(e.target.value)} value={night} /> nights KES. {total}
Discount KES. 0.00
Subtotal KES. {singleRoom.price}
Tax KES. 00.00
Total KES. {singleRoom.price}
) }
